'''Chris Wilde''' was the author and game designer of [[Morgul (video game)|Morgul]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/morgul.html Morgul] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQs, List of computer games and MUDs with a Tolkien them] (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref>
